snippet.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-US/product/UP4133-CUSA11032_00-APLAGUETALEGAME0

A Plague Tale: Innocence releases tomorrow – watch the Launch Trailer today!
Asobo Studio’s debut new IP, A Plague Tale: Innocence, launches tomorrow for PlayStation 4 on May 14. Embark on a dark adventure through a war-torn, medieval France, relentlessly pursued by the Inquisition and never-ending hordes of ravenous rats. 
A Plague Tale: Innocence tells a grim and emotional story, with gameplay blending action and adventure. Follow Amicia and her little brother Hugo, as they attempt to survive a harsh, brutal world plagued by war and the Black Death. On the run from the Inquisition and surrounded by unnatural swarms of rats, the siblings’ rocky journey will not leave them unscathed.
A Plague Tale: Innocence releases tomorrow, May 14, on PlayStation 4. Pre-orders are still available!

Rated Mature: Blood and Gore, Strong Language, Violence
